name: Franco Seiler
bio: I'm Franco Seiler, a Full Stack Developer from Córdoba, Argentina. I have over 3 years of experience building scalable web applications with React, Node.js, TypeScript and modern tools. I'm passionate about clean code, performance, user experience and integrating AI into real-world products.
availability: Open to remote or hybrid roles in Europe or globally
experience: 3+ years developing modern and scalable web applications
achievements: Optimized web app response times by 20%
Increased user retention by 15% with SPA implementation
Improved page load times by 30% using React and performance tweaks

workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed responsive front-end pages using Next.js and React
Integrated payment APIs to enhance platform functionality
Built and consumed RESTful and GraphQL APIs with Node.js and Express
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve app scalability and performance by 20%
Used Git for version control, ensuring collaboration and code integrity

workExperience.title: Software Developer
description: Built and launched responsive web apps with React and Next.js
Improved performance and loading time by 30%
Led front-end architecture for e-commerce platforms using Redux
Developed robust backend services with Node.js and Express
Used TypeScript to reduce runtime errors by 20%

workExperience.title: Front-End Developer
description: Built SPAs with React and Redux, increasing user retention by 15%
Improved conversion rates by 20% through A/B testing and performance optimization
Created internal UI component libraries, reducing development time by 30%
Developed custom React hooks for reusable, modular code

technologyExperiences.React: I've built multiple interactive user interfaces with React, including an e‑commerce platform and a task management app. I leveraged hooks, state management (Redux, Zustand), and performance optimizations to improve load times and responsiveness.
technologyExperiences.Next.js: I used Next.js for my portfolio and freelance projects to enable server‑side rendering, static site generation, and seamless routing. I integrated dynamic API routes and optimized the initial load with image and script optimization.
technologyExperiences.TypeScript: I applied TypeScript across all frontend and backend layers, reducing runtime errors by around 20% and enhancing code quality and developer experience.
technologyExperiences.Node.js: I built RESTful and GraphQL APIs with Node.js and Express, handling database connections, authentication, and business logic for various apps including e‑commerce and collaboration tools.
technologyExperiences.Express: In combination with Node.js, I used Express to structure scalable backends, define middleware, and handle routing and error management for production‑ready applications.
technologyExperiences.Python: I worked on backend utilities and scripts using Python and FastAPI/Django for specific freelance tasks, including data processing and small web services.
technologyExperiences.FastAPI: I used FastAPI to quickly spin up performant REST APIs, benefiting from its built‑in validation, documentation, and async capabilities.
technologyExperiences.Django: I built traditional web apps and admin interfaces with Django for internal tools, taking advantage of its ORM, authentication system and rapid scaffolding.
technologyExperiences.PostgreSQL: I used PostgreSQL extensively in my task manager and e‑commerce projects to model relational data with Prisma/Sequelize, write optimized SQL queries, and ensure data integrity.
technologyExperiences.MongoDB: I used MongoDB with Mongoose in my e‑commerce platform to model product catalogs, orders, and user sessions in a flexible document‑based structure.
technologyExperiences.MySQL: I applied MySQL in freelance projects requiring relational databases, creating schemas, relations and integrating with ORMs like Sequelize.
technologyExperiences.Redis: Implemented Redis for caching session data and improving performance in high‑traffic apps like task collaboration tools.
technologyExperiences.SQLite: Used lightweight SQLite databases for quick prototypes and small utilities where simplified storage was sufficient.
technologyExperiences.GraphQL: Built GraphQL APIs using Node.js and Express with Apollo Server, enabling flexible client queries in production apps.
technologyExperiences.Docker: Containerized applications end‑to‑end with Docker, defining Dockerfiles and docker‑compose for development and CI setups.
technologyExperiences.Git/GitHub/GitLab: I use Git daily with CI/CD pipelines, code reviews and branching strategies to ensure clean and collaborative development.
technologyExperiences.AWS: Deployed apps to AWS, managing CPU/storage with EC2 or Lambda, databases with RDS and S3 for static asset hosting.
technologyExperiences.Vercel/Netlify: Used Vercel and Netlify for deploying React/Next.js frontends with serverless functions and instant rollbacks.
technologyExperiences.Jest: Wrote unit tests for frontend components and backend endpoints to safeguard functionality and reduce regressions.
technologyExperiences.React Testing Library: Utilized RTL for testing UI components, ensuring accessibility compliance and component behavior.
technologyExperiences.Cypress/Playwright: Set up end‑to‑end tests with Cypress/Playwright to validate user flows like checkout or drag‑and‑drop.
technologyExperiences.OAuth/NextAuth.js/JWT: Implemented secure authentication flows using OAuth providers and JWT sessions in Next.js apps.
technologyExperiences.Tailwind CSS/Sass/Bootstrap: Styled UIs using Tailwind, Sass or Bootstrap, focusing on responsive design and consistency across devices.
technologyExperiences.Framer Motion: Added polished animations and transitions using Framer Motion to improve UX and polish interfaces.
technologyExperiences.Postman: Used Postman to test and document APIs during development and backend integrations.
technologyExperiences.Figma/Adobe XD: Created UI/UX mockups and prototypes in Figma and Adobe XD before implementation.
technologyExperiences.SEO: Optimized page structure, metadata, and performance to improve search visibility and Lighthouse scores.
technologyExperiences.Accessibility (WCAG): Ensured ARIA labels, proper semantic HTML and keyboard navigation to meet WCAG accessibility standards.

softSkills: Attention to detail with clean, accessible design
Curious and eager to learn continuously
Open to feedback and continuous improvement
